views.auth.onboarding.all-in-one.subtitl: Our app provides you with all the most important information about the sentiment of the financial market in one place.
views.auth.onboarding.all-in-one.title: Don't waste time searching through hundreds of financial pages
views.auth.onboarding.learn-about.subtit: See what experts are saying and what the forecasts are for the next few days, weeks, and months.
views.auth.onboarding.learn-about.title: Learn about the sentiment of the financial market
views.auth.onboarding.up-to-date.subtitl: Receive daily notifications and analysis to know what the trends are on the market.
views.auth.onboarding.up-to-date.title: Stay up-to-date with the sentiment of the financial market
views.auth.welcome.first-part-text: Get the latest information about the financial market:
views.auth.welcome.second-part-text: Log in or create an account
views.auth.welcome.third-part-text: to receive the latest information about market sentiment and other significant market events.
views.auth.signup.subtitle-first-part: Hi there! Please provide us with your information so we can personalize your experience.
views.auth.signup.subtitle-second-part: Add profile picture (optional): You can add a profile picture to personalize your account.
views.auth.login.subtitle: Hi there! We're glad you're back. Please log in to continue.
views.auth.errors-first-name-too-long: Your first name is too long
views.auth.errors-last-name-too-long: Your last name is too long
views.auth.errors-email-in-use: That email address is already in use
views.auth.errors-password-too-short: Password must be at lest 6 characters
views.auth.errors-confirm-password-too-s: Password must be at lest 6 characters
